# Nostalgia

## Pronunciation

- /nɒˈstaldʒə/
- /nɑˈstældʒə/

## Meanings

### Noun

A longing for home or familiar surroundings; homesickness.

---

A bittersweet yearning for the things of the past.

---

Reminiscence of the speaker's childhood or younger years.




nostalgia
